sent.subject: May schedule
sent.body: There are a few days/nights which I can hopefully not work. I don't want to work the night of 5/1, the night of 5/3, the day and night of 5/4, and the night of 5/17.Thanks,Steven

sent.subject: Re: Wy'east Climb
sent.body: I received the prospectus & roster just fine, and I'm looking forward to the climb, I'm glad that last person cancelled. I'll be calling around to possibly carpool also, I could either drive or catch a ride.Thanks again,   Steven Merriss

sent.subject: Schedule Crawler
